headline: How Halliburton’s (HAL) Data Center Power Push Is Rewriting Its Energy Services Investment Story
summary: Halliburton and VoltaGrid recently secured manufacturing for 400 megawatts of modular natural gas power systems, slated for 2028 delivery to hyperscale data centers across the Eastern Hemisphere, underscoring their focus on lower-emission, reliable power for AI, cloud, and broader digital infrastructure. This push into powering data centers extends Halliburton’s reach beyond traditional oilfield services, tying its energy expertise directly to long-term digital infrastructure demand. Next,...
